title: How to Take a Picture on Your Nintendo DSi

steps.headline: Turn on your DSi, and go to the DSi menu.
steps.description: The DSi menu will come up automatically.

steps.headline: Go to "Nintendo DSi Camera."
steps.description: It will have a little icon of a camera.

steps.headline: Click on, "Camera" on the left.
steps.description: It will tell how many pictures you can  still take.

steps.headline: Pick the lens' you want you use.
steps.description: There are 11 different lenses to choose from.

steps.headline: Once you have picked the lens you want to use, press "Start."
Think of something you want to take a picture of.
steps.description: It could be a picture of you, a friend, your cat, your dog etc.

steps.headline: Take a picture.
steps.description: Now that you know what you're going to take a picture of, click on "Capture" at the bottom of your Nintendo DSi screen or press A, L or R.

steps.headline: Your newest picture will appear on the top screen.
Keep on taking pictures of random things and soon, you will have a lot of pictures.

text: Turn on your DSi, and go to the DSi menu. The DSi menu will come up automatically. Go to "Nintendo DSi Camera." It will have a little icon of a camera. Click on, "Camera" on the left. It will tell how many pictures you can  still take. Pick the lens' you want you use. There are 11 different lenses to choose from. Once you have picked the lens you want to use, press "Start."  Think of something you want to take a picture of. It could be a picture of you, a friend, your cat, your dog etc. Take a picture. Now that you know what you're going to take a picture of, click on "Capture" at the bottom of your Nintendo DSi screen or press A, L or R. Your newest picture will appear on the top screen.  Keep on taking pictures of random things and soon, you will have a lot of pictures.
